EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Operations in 6 Parts. Super Suit Not Required.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Over the coming weeks and months join us as we explore cloud-native operations in-depth, examining both the impact and opportunities for traditional IT.
Pivotal’s John Allwright <[[https://twitter.com/johnny_a]]> will guide you through this six-part blog series on the future of operations and how Pivotal’s customers <[[http://pivotal.io/customers]]> are experiencing business-changing results along their digital transformation journey.
The blog series will take a look at:
- The Cloud-Native Ops Opportunity - Automated Ops; freedom to innovate - Seeding & Feeding Cloud-Native Operations - Cloud-Native Operations - Architecture and Monitoring - Cloud-Native Operations and the Developer Dance - Real World Cloud-Native Operations - Customer Stories
To forever change your perception of IT operations’ future - visit our blog site, check out what each blog post has in store, and sign up for email notifications so we can let you know when each blog in the series goes live.
Read the Blog <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/cloud-native-operations-in-6-parts-super-suit-not-required]]>
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
